title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:
**UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette**

**Professional Makeup Painting Kit for Unlimited Creativity**

Unleash your artistic side with our UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, a premium makeup kit designed for kids and adults alike. This comprehensive set includes 20 vibrant colors in a creamy, oil-based formula that's gentle on skin and easy to blend.

**Key Features:**

* 20 vibrant colors, including gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white
* Creamy, oil-based formula for comfortable, long-lasting wear
* Easy to blend and layer for a wide range of artistic effects
* Quick-drying, smudge-proof, and durable finish
* Minimal rub-off and easy to wash off with olive oil or professional waterproof makeup remover
* Non-toxic, skin-friendly, and suitable for all skin types

**Perfect for:**

* Halloween, FX, party, and artist makeup applications
* Festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, campfires, theme parties, and stage performances
* Creating artistic makeup looks, special effects coloring, and cosplay designs
* Kids and adults looking for a high-quality, easy-to-use face and body paint

**What's Included:**

* 20-color face and body paint palette in a sturdy, convenient plastic case
* Sponge and brush applicators for easy, precise application

**Benefits:**

* High-quality, oil-based formula for long-lasting, vibrant results
* Comfortable, gentle on skin, and suitable for all skin types
* Easy to blend, layer, and remove for a variety of artistic effects
* Perfect for a wide range of occasions and makeup applications
* Non-toxic and skin-friendly for peace of mind

**Get Ready to Unleash Your Creativity!**

Order your UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette today and discover a world of artistic possibilities!
